task.title: Backing up using the browser interface
task.shortdesc: Using the browser interface, you can create a backup of your entire system.

step.cmd: Log in to the browser interface.

step.info: estimates the size of the backup file and displays the amount of free space.

step.cmd: Depending on available storage space, proceed as follows:

choices.choice: If storage space is adequate, click Create Backup.

choice.ph: If storage space is insufficient, take action to increase available space, and then try the backup again.

taskbody.result: When the backup is complete, the compressed archive file name is displayed.
